item.title: Assignment2
item.description: Reasons for taking this course Most of the students want to learn more about the impact of computers in the design of new media. Many want to learn the intersection of media and software development. Others are interested in the design apsect of the course. Common Interests Almost everyone uses link Email Youtube Netflix Reddit Twitter Discord Slack Linkedin Instgram Specifc uses Games: Call of Duty: Vinay Adabala Jason Rinosa Kevin Santos
